articles.content: Vaccinations in the U.S. could begin as early as Friday, with the Food and Drug Administration set to vote on emergency-use authorization for the Pfizer Inc./BioNtech SE shot the day before, James Hi… [+176 chars]

articles.title: ASH: AbbVie, Roche's fixed-duration Venclexta combos gain steam in CLL - FiercePharma
articles.description: Johnson & Johnson and AbbVie’s Imbruvica is the standard of care in previously untreated chronic lymphocytic leukemia (CLL). But patients need to take it indefinitely, which can be difficult, both mentally and physically. Enter Venclexta, which AbbVie and Roc…
